# 尚学堂 Java 程序员面试题集大全 201901

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shang-xuetang-java-chengxuyuan-mian-shitiji-daquan-201901
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shang-xuetang-java-chengxuyuan-mian-shitiji-daquan-201901
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shang-xuetang-java-chengxuyuan-mian-shitiji-daquan-201901
shang-xuetang-java-chengxuyuan-mian-shitiji-daquan-201901 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shang-xuetang-java-chengxuyuan-mian-shitiji-daquan-erlingyijiulingyi
shang-xuetang-java-chengxuyuan-mian-shitiji-daquan-erlingyijiulingyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
